title: Month End Parameters
body: Monthly full test. Nitrate at 16 ppm. Tank has been very stable this month. Plants growing well.

title: Feeding
body: Fed: flakes + bloodworms. Added some blanched zucchini for the plecos.

title: Weekly Maintenance
body: Water change 30%. Dosed NilocG Thrive Plus 3 pumps. Cleaned glass, removed some algae from driftwood.

title: Parameters Check
body: Tested parameters. Nitrate at 18 ppm, slightly elevated but nothing concerning. Will monitor.

title: Veggie Day
body: Fed: veggie-only today. Blanched spinach and zucchini. Everyone loves veggie day!

title: Weekly Water Change
body: Water change 25%. Added Seachem Excel 1 capful for spot treatment on some hair algae. Dosed Thrive 3 pumps.

title: Observation Week Checkpoint
body: Tank is looking stable after 6 weeks. Nitrate at 14 ppm. Plants growing well, added some java moss to provide more cover for fry.

title: Daily Feeding
body: Fed: flakes + brine shrimp. Tetras are schooling beautifully, very healthy behavior.

title: Maintenance
body: Water change 30%. Trimmed some fast-growing stem plants. Tank maintenance is getting into a good rhythm.

title: Parameter Test
body: Weekly test shows nitrate around 18 ppm. Fed: algae wafers + flakes. Cory cats very active.

title: Feeding
body: Fed: flakes only today. Keeping diet varied but simple this week.

title: Weekly Check
body: Parameters looking good. Nitrate at 15 ppm. Dosed Thrive Plus 3 pumps. Added some new anubias plants.
